document_data.name: Gnormahlenvaey Catoneriehn
document_data.basicrefs: {{Cite dragon/228/Rogues Gallery: Gangsters of the Underdark|53,54}}
document_data.mainbody:
a deep gnome, Squeaky had strong [[infravision]] and partial magic resistance, as well as the ability to innately cast ''[[blur]]'', ''[[blindness]]'', and ''[[change self]]''.

Squeaky was quite good at begging, intimidating, and thought himself good at mimicking other voices (he was not). Those who listened to his voice for too long could be compelled to physically strike him to stop it, while extended exposure to his high-pitched noises could drive others into a state of medium-term insanity.
document_data.Description: Squeaky was small for a [[gnome]] at {{SI|2'9"|'"|long=yes}}, and had dark gray skin and eyes, messy hair, and a thick coating of grime. He had a very high pitched, grating voice that gave him his name.
document_data.Abilities:
As a deep gnome, Squeaky had strong [[infravision]] and partial magic resistance, as well as the ability to innately cast ''[[blur]]'', ''[[blindness]]'', and ''[[change self]]''.

Squeaky was quite good at begging, intimidating, and thought himself good at mimicking other voices (he was not). Those who listened to his voice for too long could be compelled to physically strike him to stop it, while extended exposure to his high-pitched noises could drive others into a state of medium-term insanity.
document_data.Possessions: Squeaky was very attached to his oversized [[leather armor]], as it made him feel larger. His favorite weapon was a human-sized [[crossbow]] he called "Da Crusha", which he always shot off before going into melee. He kept a ''+2 [[dagger]]'' in a wrist sheath, and wore a magical [[copper piece]] around his neck that hummed when law enforcement came within {{SI|60|ft|long=yes}} of him.
